summary: Edmond Henri Fischer  is a Swiss-born American biochemist.
full_text: Edmond Henri Fischer  is a Swiss American biochemist. He and his collaborator Edwin G. Krebs were awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1992 for describing how reversible phosphorylation works as a switch to activate proteins and regulate various cellular processes. From 2007 until 2014, he was the Honorary President of the World Cultural Council.
title: Edmond H. Fischer
